attributes.action: Churches to be abolished and converted to mosque
attributes.additional_details: Muslim preachers and Islamist are taking over churches in England and abolishing the Christianity cultural symbol how can this be allowed, this country has a greater scale of multi cultural diversity and traditional aspects we have patriotism for the UK and we respect everyone of their culture, religion and races. Minority of muslims wanting a fair brotherhood  not criticising but the rest whom are using the name of God for terrorism . UK's symbolises Christianity from centuries. Why are the christianity, Catholic monuments such as churches are vanishing so quickly? Is this fair and is that why Islam is the fastest growing religion by abolishing churches in England and Wales?
